snippet: “Mic Check: Hip-Hop From North Africa and the Middle East,” at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, included a lineup of Tunisian, Egyptian, Malian and (London-born) Palestinian rappers.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews show Mic Check: Hip-Hop From North Africa and the Middle East at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: “Mic Check: Hip-Hop From North Africa and the Middle East,” at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, included a lineup of Tunisian, Egyptian, Malian and (London-born) Palestinian rappers.

headline.seo: ‘Mic Check,’ Hip-Hop From Africa and the Middle East, at BAM
headline.main: Speaking Rap’s Universal Language in the Ferment of the Arab Spring
headline.print_headline: Speaking Rap’s Universal Language in the Ferment of the Arab Spring
